1013410.name: REDVIIL
1013410.description:
My name is Alice and this is my story ...



Redviil This is a post-apocalyptic indie game. The world has swept a pandemic. Disrupted DNA was found in 1% of the population of the planet due to which they developed immunity. The rest were forced to go into the bunkers under the ground to escape from infection. Alice is a brilliant scientist and owner of an impaired gene. Your task is to explore the cruel and mysterious world, stand up, fight for survival and try to find a cure.

Redviil - This is:
  • Fascinating gameplay;
  • Tactical real time battle, with the possibility of slowing down the time for decision-making;
  • A smart non-linear AI that makes you think;
  • The main character with her cockroaches in her head;)
  • Arrangement of the base and its defense from lovers of profit;
  • The laboratory with its research of the virus, the search for drugs and not only; )
  • Modification and improvement of weapons;
  • Beautiful thoughtful environment;
  • Survival mode;
  • And much more...
